data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Liuixalus (Anura: Rhacophoridae) from southern China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Jian-Huan, Rao, Ding-Qi, Wang, Ying-Yong (2015): A new species of the genus Liuixalus (Anura: Rhacophoridae) from southern China. Zootaxa 3990 (2): 247-258, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.2.5
